editions.name: Energy Drink
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull Energy Drink is consumed worldwide by professional athletes, university students, and during long journeys

editions.name: Energy Drink Sugarfree
editions.flavor_description: Wings without sugar: Red Bull Sugarfree is Red Bull Energy Drink but without sugar

editions.name: Energy Drink Zero
editions.flavor_description: Rediscover the taste and wings of Red Bull. Without sugar

editions.name: The Summer Edition
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull Summer Edition: The energy drink with the extraordinary taste of White Peach, enhanced by a hint of citrus and subtle floral notes

editions.name: The Sea Blue Edition
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull Sea Blue Edition with the irresistible taste of Juneberry
editions.alt_text: Red Bull Sea Blue Edition - image

editions.name: The Apricot Edition
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull Apricot Edition is the perfect combination of Apricot and Strawberry with a light touch of Peach

editions.name: The Green Edition
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull Green Edition with the exotic taste of Dragon Fruit

editions.name: The White Edition
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull White Edition mixing the exotic taste of Coconut and the fruity taste of Acai

editions.name: The Red Edition
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull Red Edition with the fresh taste of Watermelon

editions.name: The Blue Edition
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull Blue Edition. A classic with the fruity taste of Blueberry
